Description.Text: Hotel Club San Remo is situated on the S`Estanyol beach with beautiful views over the marvellous San Antonio bay. The hotel has totally been refurbished during the winter season of 2006,. Near by the Hotel clients can find plenty of entertainment and sport possibilities, including water sport practice. The spacious rooms are fully-equipped with bath-room hair-dryer; Plasma satellite TV, music channels, telephone, safety-box, air conditioning and terraces. Hotel has a large garden area with swimming pool and sun terrace and its right on the beach.
